name: My-Dev-Space – Developer Portfolio (Main Website)
desc: My latest developer portfolio built using Astro and deployed with custom domain. Will include blog, CI/CD, and dynamic content. Full content update coming soon.

name: Mood Tab – Chrome Extension
desc: A mood-based animated new-tab Chrome extension featuring curated background videos, motivational quotes, real-time weather, and Google search with history — developed using JavaScript and Open APIs.

name: Just‑Download – Desktop App
desc: A simple cross-platform Python-based desktop application to download videos from YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook. Built using Tkinter and yt-dlp. Legacy version — next-gen redesign planned.

name: Just‑Download – Android Backend (Planned)
desc: Python Flask-based backend for the Android version of Just‑Download. Built to handle video download requests from mobile UI. Frontend in progress.

name: Teaste of Italia – Food Order App (Planned)
desc: A vegetarian food ordering app featuring live menu, user authentication, and order management panel. MERN-based, currently under active planning and design phase.

name: Hospital Management System (Legacy)
desc: An early version of a hospital admin panel built using ASP.NET and SQL Server for managing appointments, staff, and patients. Legacy project — planned to be re-developed with modern tech stack.

name: Lifeline – Blood Donor System (Coming Soon)
desc: A real-world MERN-based platform to connect blood donors and seekers with urgent request notifications, search filters, and admin dashboard. Currently in design and planning stage.

name: Grih‑Chhaya – Rental App (Demo Version)
desc: An Indian-themed rental application for short cultural stays. Demo built using MERN stack. Full version under development with advanced filtering and admin features.

name: Sky‑Verse – Weather UI (Demo Version)
desc: A real-time weather experience project with immersive visuals and quote overlays. Built using JavaScript and weather APIs. Demo version uploaded — full update planned soon.

name: News Sathi – Reader App (Demo Version)
desc: A minimalist Indian-themed news web app built using EJS and Express.js. Displays trending headlines with clean UI. Demo uploaded — being restructured with better APIs and mobile view.

name: Docker Multi‑Environment Setup
desc: A centralized Docker setup for PHP, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, and other services — helps spin up dev environments faster across multiple stacks. Used in personal and client projects.
